title: Africa awakens modern Nigeria
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Africa - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Nigeria - Description and travel
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Developing countries - Social conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Africa - Social conditions
description: Presents Nigeria, the most populated country in Africa progressing in the use of modern techniques and self-government. Stresses the influences of climate and geography on the economy, urbanization and education. Shows how the country has developed from a rich and ancient civilization, to becoming an independent nation.
